mods.abstract: Two color window card (black on split fountain, yellow to red) announcing The Cumberland Music Tour featuring tough mountain music, flatfood dancing, and ballads and stories to make you laugh and cry. Poster features a woodcut of trees and a plateau, and a metal photoplate of Johnny Ray Hicks, The Troxell Brothers, Virgil Anderson with Willard and Hershel, and Clyde Davenport. The Tour was a project of the Southern Arts Federation with major support from the National Endowment for the Arts Folk Arts Program. For more information, see http://tnfolklife.org/publications/cumberland-music-tour/.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
